text: Bhalariya is a census town in Udaipur district in the state of Rajasthan, India. ==Demographics== India census, Bhalariya had a population of 6530. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Bhalariya has an average literacy rate of 83%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 55% of the males and 45% of the females literate. 10% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Udaipur district
title: Bhalariya
